comments: Is this the same as A072493 with its first 8 terms removed? See also the similar conjecture concerning A005428 and A073941.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
K. Burde, Das Problem der Abz√§hlreime und Zahlentwicklungen mit gebrochenen Basen, J. Number Theory 26 (1987), no. 2, 192-209.
mathematica: f[s_] := Append[s, Ceiling[5 + Plus@@(s/3)]]; Nest[f, {5}, 100] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jan 08 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Simon Plouffe_
extensions: More terms (from the Burde paper p. 208) from _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 26 2006
